Support from Azure

We provide the following support services to our customers:

  Supported or not
Billing and Subscription Management
Service Health Dashboard
Web Submission
Unlimited Disruption/Restoration
Telephone Support
ICP Filing Support

Support Scope

  • Disruption/restoration issues are issues encountered when using Azure that are confirmed to be caused by the platform.
  • We support all Azure Services that are released to general availability (GA), as well as non-Microsoft technologies provided by Microsoft as part of Azure product functions (sample codes of Azure SDK and Python).

Working Time

  • Technical Support:
    • Severity A (emergency event): 24 x 7;
    • Severity B/C:
      • IaaS support: 9:00 - 00:00 (all year round);
      • PaaS support: 9:00 - 00:00 (working days only).
  • Billing, subscription and quota management support; product consulting and pre-sales support; ICP filing support: 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. on working days.

Note: The time above is Beijing time (UTC + 8)
